content.prompt: Compared with a late-nineteenth-century Social Darwinist view of the world, Voltaireâ€™s view in the passage is

choices.label: more skeptical of the ability of science to explain the natural world
more accepting of the idea of a racial basis for the differences between European and non-European societies

less accepting of the idea that humans are rational animals

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
